questions.question: What is the main focus of UX design?
What is the main focus of UI design?
options: Visual design and layout of interface elements

questions.question: What is a user persona?
options: A fictional representation of target users

questions.question: What is a wireframe?
options: A low-fidelity blueprint of page layout

questions.question: What is usability testing?
options: Testing how easy a design is to use

questions.question: What is a design system?
options: A collection of reusable design elements and guidelines

questions.question: What is accessibility in design?
options: Making designs usable for people with disabilities

questions.question: What is a user journey map?
options: A visualization of user experience over time

questions.question: What is the purpose of A/B testing?
options: To compare two versions of a design to see which performs better

questions.question: What is a prototype?
options: An early model of a design that can be tested

questions.question: What is the difference between UX and UI?
options: UX is about interface, UI is about experience
UX is about experience, UI is about interface
UX is for mobile, UI is for web

questions.question: What is a design pattern?
options: A reusable solution to common design problems

questions.question: What is user-centered design?
options: Design process focused on user needs and preferences

questions.question: What is a style guide?
options: A document defining design standards and usage

questions.question: What is the purpose of user research?
options: To understand user needs, behaviors, and motivations

questions.question: What is responsive design?
options: Design that responds to user input
Design that adapts to different screen sizes

questions.question: What is the goal of UX/UI design?
options: To create intuitive and enjoyable user experiences
